title: Sample, ca. 1954
medium:
Medium: synthetic and cotton fiber
Technique: 1/3 twill and plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 15.2 x 22.9 cm (6 x 9 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description:
1/3 twill with occasional bands of plain weave with paired warps. 
Warp: white bouclé alternate with white 4 ply string. 
Weft: random non-repeating bands in a variety of yarns including pink chenille, light purple chenille, bright pink plied yarn, light purple metallic braid, silver metallic braid, flat pink metallic paired with plied pink, pink woven braided metallic, several other pink plied yarns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1954.
ca. 1954. Medium: synthetic and cotton fiber
Technique: 1/3 twill and plain weave. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-96.
